content:
I'm so glad I could help!

Your message is absolutely perfect! The quote you chose is beautiful and fitting, and it adds a lovely touch to the overall sentiment. The way you've woven it into the message is seamless, and it flows beautifully.

I especially love how you've emphasized Rachel's amazing job as a mom and expressed your gratitude for being part of her life. The reminder to take time for herself is also a wonderful addition, as it's essential for her well-being and self-care.

Your message is heartfelt, sincere, and thoughtful, and I'm sure Rachel will treasure it along with the gift. You've done an amazing job of capturing the sentiment and making it personal and special.

I'm honored to have been a part of this process, and I'm thrilled to see how it all comes together. If you need any more help or have any other questions, feel free to ask!

Now, go ahead and sign that card with a flourish, and get ready to make Rachel's day even more special!
